profile.title: Profile
profile.signInToView: Please sign in to view your profile.
profile.profilePictureDescription: Upload a profile picture to personalize your account
profile.photoHint: JPG, PNG or WebP. Images are automatically resized.
profile.personalInfoDescription: Update your personal information and preferences
profile.billingAddressDescription: Save your billing information for faster checkout
profile.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app
profile.signInRequired: Please sign in to edit your profile.
profile.verifyEmailDescription: You must verify your email address before you can edit your profile. Check your inbox for the verification link we sent to

profile.usernameDescription: This is how others will see you
profile.usernamePlaceholder: How you want to be known
profile.ageRangeDescription: We use this to help recommend shows tailored to your interests.
profile.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
profile.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be scheduled for permanent deletion. You will have 30 days to contact support if you change your mind.
profile.deleteAccountConfirmTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteAccountFailed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
profile.accountDeleted: Your account has been scheduled for deletion.

profile.notificationUpdateFailed: Failed to update notification settings. Please try again.

checkout.smsNotifications: Sign up for SMS notifications from Force Majeure to stay up to date on latest events and gain access to pre-sale

contact.title: Contact us.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: Just hang tight.
comingSoon.artistDescription: We're looking for local artists to open up for our 2026 events. If you're a DJ, producer, or performer, we'd love to hear from you.
comingSoon.artistSignedUpDescription: Keep an eye out for posted events where you can express interest in joining the lineup.

artistSignup.seoDescription: Submit your artist profile and get discovered by Austin's most engaged electronic music community. Book shows, connect with fans, and grow your career.
artistSignup.valueProposition1: FM has, and always will be, a group that elevates the local Austin electronic scene by taking care of our artists.
artistSignup.valueProposition2: We proudly make sure our event undercards represent a diverse selection of rising stars from an expansive pantheon of genre.
artistSignup.valueProposition3: So go ahead and click that button below and let's get rolling.
artistSignup.closingLine: Can't wait to make you a part of our rave fam.

artistSignupDemo.title: Artist Signup Demo
artistSignupDemo.subtitle: Test the artist registration flow with auto-populated data
artistSignupDemo.manualModeDescription: Start with an empty form and fill in all fields manually
artistSignupDemo.spotifyModeDescription: Select a Spotify artist and auto-fill the rest of the form
artistSignupDemo.soundcloudModeDescription: Select a SoundCloud artist and auto-fill the rest of the form
artistSignupDemo.previewNote: Preview of the data that will be populated in the registration form
artistSignupDemo.noDataGenerated: No data generated yet. Select a mode and click Generate Data.
